entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
